mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_ic_suggest_type
TYPE_NAME = #{typeName},
IS_FIXED = #{isFixed},
RECIPIENT_IDS = #{recipientIds},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
,MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
